DOC.brief_summary: This pilot research trial study biomarkers bone marrow sample pediatric patient high risk acute myeloid leukemia . Studying sample bone marrow patient cancer laboratory may help doctor identify learn biomarkers related cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Bone Marrow Samples From Pediatric Patients With High-Risk Acute Myeloid Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To provide detailed , molecular map pediatric high risk acute myeloid leukemia ( AML ) . II . To identify mutation , expression profile , gene copy number , loss heterozygosity ( LOH ) status genomic methylation pattern order identify novel change associate pediatric AML . III . To generate fibroblast cell line order obtain germline nucleic acid marrow specimens AML patient induction failure . IV . To identify genomic alteration contribute induction failure childhood AML . OUTLINE : Banked bone marrow sample diagnosis remission use develop detailed molecular map pediatric high-risk acute myeloid leukemia . Analysis include genome single nucleotide polymorphism ( SNP ) genotyping , expression , methylation profiling .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis acute myeloid leukemia Highrisk disease Treated COGAAML03P1 COGAAML0531 Meets follow criterion : Initial remission know adverse risk factor High quantity quality ribonucleic acid ( RNA ) deoxyribonucleic acid ( DNA ) available Highly enrich specimen > = 50 % blast available
